#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define LL long long
#define MAX 10e15

LL energy[200001],height[200001];

int main(){
	
	LL n;
		
	cin>>n;
	
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>height[i];
		
	energy[0]=0;
	
	for(int i=1;i<n;i++){
		
		energy[i]=10e16;
		for(int j=1;(i-j)>=0;j*=2)
			energy[i]=min(energy[i],abs(height[i]-height[i-j])+energy[i-j]);
	}
	
	cout<<energy[n-1];			
	
	return 0;
	
}
